thoughts.title: Editable Segments
thoughts.description: Allow users to click and edit individual segments in a modal.

segments.title: Editable Segments
segments.description: Allow users to click and edit individual segments in a modal.

thoughts.title: Segment Type Field Parsing
thoughts.description: Allow parsing of field types such as text, location, date, numeric for better filtering.

segments.title: Segment Type Field Parsing
segments.description: Allow parsing of field types such as text, location, date, numeric for better filtering.

thoughts.title: Color Tag Picker
thoughts.description: Add ability to select a color per bubble or per segment.

segments.title: Color Tag Picker
segments.description: Add ability to select a color per bubble or per segment.

thoughts.title: Delete/Edit Thought Bubble
thoughts.description: UI button logic to delete or rename a thought bubble.

segments.title: Delete/Edit Thought Bubble
segments.description: UI button logic to delete or rename a thought bubble.

thoughts.title: Sort and Collapse Segments
thoughts.description: Enable sorting and collapsibility for bubbles with many segments.

segments.title: Sort and Collapse Segments
segments.description: Enable sorting and collapsibility for bubbles with many segments.

thoughts.title: Auto-Save State
thoughts.description: Ensure session persistence using localStorage or IndexedDB.

segments.title: Auto-Save State
segments.description: Ensure session persistence using localStorage or IndexedDB.

thoughts.title: AI Assistant Integration
thoughts.description: Optional toggle to call AI to suggest fields, auto-tag thoughts, and summarize content.

segments.title: AI Assistant Integration
segments.description: Optional toggle to call AI to suggest fields, auto-tag thoughts, and summarize content.

thoughts.title: Inline Segment Editing
thoughts.description: Allow direct in-place editing of segments from the detail panel.

segments.title: Inline Segment Editing
segments.description: Allow direct in-place editing of segments from the detail panel.

thoughts.title: Delete & Rename Bubbles
thoughts.description: Add UI controls to delete or rename thought bubbles directly.

segments.title: Delete & Rename Bubbles
segments.description: Add UI controls to delete or rename thought bubbles directly.

thoughts.title: Drag-and-Drop Reposition
thoughts.description: Enable dragging bubbles on the canvas and persist new positions.

segments.title: Drag-and-Drop Reposition
segments.description: Enable dragging bubbles on the canvas and persist new positions.

thoughts.title: Field-Type-Aware Filters
thoughts.description: Implement specialized filter inputs based on field type (e.g., date pickers, sliders).

segments.title: Field-Type-Aware Filters
segments.description: Implement specialized filter inputs based on field type (e.g., date pickers, sliders).

thoughts.title: Bulk Actions UX Polish
thoughts.description: Improve bulk action UI into a contextual toolbar when filters are active.

segments.title: Bulk Actions UX Polish
segments.description: Improve bulk action UI into a contextual toolbar when filters are active.

thoughts.title: Inline Color Picker
thoughts.description: Allow changing bubble or segment color via an inline color picker.

segments.title: Inline Color Picker
segments.description: Allow changing bubble or segment color via an inline color picker.

description: ThoughtWeb Planning Roadmap: A structured list of upcoming features and enhancements, represented as thought bubbles for import and visualization in ThoughtWeb. Each bubble outlines feature details, priority, and target version.
